name: deserve
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to have earned or to be given something because of the way you have behaved or the qualities you have

example.eg: After all that hard work, you deserve a holiday.
example.egtrans: 干了那么多活儿，你该休假了。

example.eg: Chris deserves our special thanks for all his efforts.
example.egtrans: 我们应该特别感谢克里斯所付出的心血。

example.eg: I hope they get the punishment they deserve.
example.egtrans: 我希望他们受到应有的惩罚。

example.eg: They certainly deserved to win that game.
example.egtrans: 他们当然应该赢得那场比赛。
